alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Telfair; Wilcox (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 30 at 12:25PM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Ocmulgee River at Abbeville affecting Telfair, Wilcox and Dodge Counties. For the Ocmulgee River Basin...including Jackson, Griffin, Juliette, Juliette, Dames Ferry, Macon, Macon, Hawkinsville, Byron, Clinchfield, Hawkinsville, Abbeville, McRae, Scotland, Lumber City... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ocmulgee River at Abbeville. * WHEN...From Friday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Flooding of farm lands...timberlands...and access roads will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 9.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue rising to a crest of 15.4 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
